mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CHALLENGE_COMMENT ( COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_WRITER, COMMENT_FILE_URL, REF_BOARD_NO, COMMENT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{commentContent}, #{commentWriter}, #{commentFileUrl}, #{refBoardNo}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_NO commentNo, REF_BOARD_NO refBoardNo, USER_NAME commentWriter, COMMENT_CONTENT commentContent, COMMENT_DATE createDate, COMMENT_FILE_URL commentFileUrl FROM TB_CHALLENGE_COMMENT JOIN TB_USER ON (COMMENT_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE REF_BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY COMMENT_DATE DESC
